metadata.title: CVE-2018-18778 on Ubuntu 20.04 ESM (focal) - high
metadata.description:
ACME mini_httpd before 1.30 lets remote users read arbitrary files.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2018-18778` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

mini-httpd - 1.30-2
No subscription required

criterions.comment: mini-httpd package in focal, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.30-2').
